rows.title: Standard Template

message_text.eng: This is a standard template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation.
message_text.esp: Esta es una planilla estandar que demuestra una variedad de cosas que necesitarían ser traducidas y algunas que están excluídas de la traducción.

rows.message_text: This is a standard template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation.

rows.title: Nested Template

message_text.eng: This is a nested template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation. This will allow us to check that the multi-lingual system works with nesting.
message_text.esp: Esta es una planilla anidada que demuestra una variedad de cosas que necesitarían ser traducidas y algunas que están excluídas de la traducción. Esto nos permitirá verificar que el sistema multilingual funciona cuando se anida.

rows.message_text: This is a nested template that demonstrates a variety of things that would need to be translated and a few things that are excluded from translation. This will allow us to check that the multi-lingual system works with nesting.

rows.title: Component to translate

message_text.eng: This is an example of a component that requires translation: the placeholder text and the selected option should be translated
message_text.esp: Este es un ejemplo de un componente que requiere ser traducido: el marcador de posición u la opción seleccionada deben ser traducidos

rows.message_text: This is an example of a component that requires translation: the placeholder text and the selected option should be translated

rows.title: Component that should not be translated translate

title.eng: Component that should not be translated translate

message_text.eng: This is an example of a component that is excluded from translation. The button text should still be Pop-up 1.
message_text.esp: Este es un ejemplo de un componente que esta excluído de la traducción. El texto del botón debería mantenerse como Pop-up 1.

rows.message_text: This is an example of a component that is excluded from translation. The button text should still be Pop-up 1.

rows.title: Step without translation

message_text.eng: This step in the tour should not be translated as the exclude_from_translation column is TRUE.

rows.message_text: This step in the tour should not be translated as the exclude_from_translation column is TRUE.
